p: The “traditional or herbal medicines” are those originating from plant sources and are generally regarded as safe (GRAS) at the concoction dosage, based on their historical usage in various cultures [ 3]. Thus, plants remain the most abundant natural primary source of active drugs and are invaluable in the ethnomedical treatment of diverse ailments [ 4]. Medicinal plants are generally sources of various phytochemicals, some of which are usually responsible for their biological activities.
